import React from 'react' import { Col, Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' import '../App.css' import axios from 'axios' import {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import {useParams} from 'react-router' const ThirdScreen = ({match}) => { const url = useParams() const [Detail, setDetail] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { const fechData = async() =>{ try { const {data} = await axios.get(`/${url.name}`) const a = Object.keys(data[url.titleId]) const vue = data[url.titleId] setDetail(vue[`${a[5]}`]) } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } fechData() }, []) //find specific destination console.log(de) const countryDetail = Detail.find((d)=>d._id === match.params.id ) console.log(countryDetail) const aa = countryDetail return (

{countryDetail.name} - {countryDetail.state}

{countryDetail.description}

dafaf
vhda
scsys
) } export default ThirdScreen
